title: Role Challenge

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may attack two players instead each full moon.
- If at least 5 different people posted a role within 24 hours of this role's post, you can win with all Neutrals.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who didn't post a role within 24 hours of this role's post.

desc:
Post 4100
*We made 500 roles in the first day of GIM y'all can do this come on*
